content.query:
---cars exploration
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://capstonesecondcars.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone-filesystem/bronze/cars/cars.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


---customers exploration
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://capstonesecondcars.blob.core.windows.net/capstone-filesystem/bronze/customers/customers.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

---policy exploration
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://capstonesecondcars.blob.core.windows.net/capstone-filesystem/bronze/policy/policy.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

---sales exploration
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://capstonesecondcars.blob.core.windows.net/capstone-filesystem/bronze/sales/sales.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
